name: Death Click Hotel - Stickman Edition
description: 1 Click,8 Sticks, Can you kill them all? Ahh what a beautiful day in this fine city neighborhood. Cars buzzing by, guys exercising by a pond, and hot dog vender open for business. Now its up to you to end everyone's life in tragic ways! Try to find ways to cause chain reactions that result in everyone's death! You only get 1 click, so use it wisely! Have fun!
